name: Thingies Tower
description:
This project was created for the Kenney Jam 22!

Thingies Tower is a game about building a tower with random objects given to you by a wizard in the form of cards. Go as high as you can to avoid your demise!

Controls :

Left Mouse Button - Drag and drop cards in the building area.

Arrow keys / AD  - Rotate the object before placing it.

H - Reset the high score.
